Bless/Buff: Armor Piercing Weapons
 
(Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
A large number of friendly units are gifted with weapons so sharp that they can cut through armor and flesh with equal ease.
Targets' melee attacks deal AP damage.
